SEARCH
Package au.csiro.pathling.projection

Record Class ProjectionContext

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
au.csiro.pathling.projection.ProjectionContext
Record Components:
evaluator - an evaluator for FHIRPath expressions (produces Column expressions)
inputContext - the initial context for evaluation
public record ProjectionContext(@Nonnull SingleResourceEvaluator evaluator, @Nonnull Collection inputContext) extends Record
Dependencies and logic relating to the traversal of FHIRPath expressions.

This context holds an evaluator for FHIRPath expressions and the current input context for expression evaluation.

Author:
Piotr Szul

  • Method Details

    • withInputContext

      @Nonnull public ProjectionContext withInputContext(@Nonnull Collection inputContext)
      Creates a new ProjectionContext with a different input context.
      Parameters:
      inputContext - the new input context
      Returns:
      a new ProjectionContext with the specified input context

    • asStubContext

      @Nonnull public ProjectionContext asStubContext()
      Creates a new ProjectionContext with the current input context collection with the value set to null.

      This is useful for creating stub contexts when determining result schemas without evaluating actual data, or when no input data is available. This is different from withEmptyInput() in that it preserves the type of the input context collection, but replaces the underlying data with an empty representation.

      Returns:
      a new ProjectionContext with an empty input context

    • withInputColumn

      @Nonnull public ProjectionContext withInputColumn(@Nonnull Column inputColumn)
      Creates a new ProjectionContext with the input context replaced by a new column.

      This is a convenience method that wraps the column in a new input context while preserving other context properties. It is particularly useful when transforming input data during projection evaluation.

      Parameters:
      inputColumn - the new input column to use
      Returns:
      a new ProjectionContext with the specified input column

    • withEmptyInput

      @Nonnull public ProjectionContext withEmptyInput()
      Creates a new ProjectionContext with an empty input context.

      This is useful for creating stub contexts when determining result schemas without evaluating actual data, or when no input data is available.

      Returns:
      a new ProjectionContext with an empty input context

    • evalExpression

      @Nonnull public Collection evalExpression(@Nonnull FhirPath path)
      Evaluates the given FHIRPath path and returns the result as a collection.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to evaluate
      Returns:
      the result as a collection

    • asColumnOperator

      @Nonnull public UnaryOperator<Column> asColumnOperator(@Nonnull FhirPath path)
      Creates a unary operator that evaluates a FHIRPath expression on a given column.

      This method returns a function that takes a column as input, evaluates the specified FHIRPath expression using that column as the input context, and returns the resulting column value. This is particularly useful for creating reusable transformations that can be applied to multiple columns or used in higher-order operations like tree traversal.

      Example use case: Creating a traversal operation for recursive tree structures where the same FHIRPath expression needs to be evaluated on each node.

      Parameters:
      path - the FHIRPath expression to evaluate
      Returns:
      a unary operator that takes a column and returns the result of evaluating the expression on that column

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
